featureCards.title: All-in-one architecture
featureCards.description: Build prompts, agents, workflows, MCPs, manage content, set permissions, control costs, track logs, and more. All in one place.

featureCards.title: Simple to get started
featureCards.description: Forget the complicated setup. Get up and running in minutes, and spend your time actually building.

section.title: Built for the future of work
section.description: Everything you need to build, deploy, and manage your agentic workforce in one unified platform.

mainBenefits.title: Unified MCP Provider
mainBenefits.description: Build, test, and manage MCPs right from your browser, connecting your agents and workflows securely and with full control to any system or service you want.

mainBenefits.title: Easy to consume LLM
mainBenefits.description: Use language models easily and only pay for what you use. Just add your balance and start building—no complicated billing or surprises.

mainBenefits.title: Easy to sell MCP Apps
mainBenefits.description: List your apps, set your price, and get paid directly from users' wallets. You build, you earn, it's that simple.

section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section.description: Everything you need to build, run, and scale AI across your organization with control and confidence.

faqItems.question: What exactly is deco.chat?
faqItems.answer: deco.chat is an open-source AI workspace that helps organizations build and manage AI agents. It's designed to make AI implementation simple, whether for internal tools or customer-facing applications.

faqItems.question: How is this different from other AI platforms?
faqItems.answer: We're built entirely on TypeScript, not Python. This means everything runs in your browser, connects seamlessly with web technologies, and integrates with your existing development workflow.

faqItems.question: What are MCPs and why should I care?
faqItems.answer: MCPs (Model Context Protocols) are the standard way to connect AI models to your systems. We make it easy to build, test, and manage these connections right from your browser with full security and control.

faqItems.question: Do I need to know Python to use this?
faqItems.answer: No Python required! Everything is TypeScript-based, so if you know JavaScript or web development, you can build powerful AI agents and workflows.

faqItems.question: Can I connect to my existing tools and databases?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! Our unified MCP provider connects to any system or service you use. From databases to APIs to third-party tools, we handle the integration securely.

faqItems.question: How do I get started?
faqItems.answer: Just run 'deno -A jsr:@deco/cli create' in your terminal and you'll have a working agent setup in minutes. No complicated configuration or setup required.

faqItems.question: Is this suitable for enterprise use?
faqItems.answer: Yes! Built for scale with enterprise-grade security, monitoring, and control. You can run everything on-premise or in the cloud with full audit trails and governance.

faqItems.question: Can I sell the agents I build?
faqItems.answer: Coming soon! We're building a marketplace where you can list your agents, set your price, and get paid directly. You build, you earn, it's that simple.

primaryButton.text: Build agents, set up workflows, and connect with other builders.
